channel.title: Need Help Adding Something <317>
channel.description:
hello guys i made an Dragon Whip When I Wield It It gives +0 +0 +0 +0 +0 to all things can when i want see what are attack styles it shows like its a scimter lung slash. +no Special Attack
The Help I Want Is
1)How To Add Stats For It 2)How To Make Its Name In Trade !!NON EXSTING ITEM 11247!! ????//// and when im wearing it on attack styles 3)How To Add Special Attacks :D
PLEASE Help Me It Would be Too big for me if u did that thansk alot......... ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D
